title: Zoom CEO on 'Taking Quick Actions'
itunes:title: Zoom CEO on 'Taking Quick Actions'
description:
Eric Yuan, CEO at Zoom, discusses privacy issues for the popular video conferencing service after trolls hijacked meetings with racist and pornographic content in attacks known as "Zoombombings." He says his IT team made a mistake but is working "ten times harder" to provide stronger security going forward.

Hosts: Carol Massar & Jason Kelly. Proudcer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
